title.rendered: “Remembering IDF Heroes: Fallen Soldiers’ Details Revealed Amid Gaza Strip Conflicts”

content.rendered:
The attached message from the IDF spokesperson refers to the names of three IDF soldiers whose death notifications have been delivered to their families: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC21122023.026531

Attached is a link to the IDF website, where details and pictures of the fallen are published and updated:
https://www.idf.il/59780

In addition, in the battle where Sgt. Omri Schwartz and Sgt. Eilian Yaakov were killed, an officer and two soldiers from the Givati Brigade, School of Officers, were severely injured.

Moreover, two warriors in the Battalion 50, the Nachal Brigade, were severely injured in a battle in the Gaza Strip.
A (res.) combatant from the Oketz Unit, the Merom Division, was severely injured in a battle in the Gaza Strip. An Armor Corps officer in the Battalion 532, Brigade 460 was severely injured in a battle in the north of the Gaza Strip.

Additionally, a (res.) Armored Corps combatant in the Battalion 9218, the Qiryati (4) Brigade, was severely injured in a battle in the south of the Gaza Strip.

The injured were evacuated for medical treatment and their families have been updated.
